## parseGitName() function

parses a git string and returns the repo name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseGitName(repo: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  repo | string | the raw repo name containing .git |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
